group_1.textRight: Yeah…@He seems pretty serious about it...

group_1.textLeft: I never thought he would run for mayor!

group_1.textRight: Apparently he's been discussing it@for a long time...

group_1.textLeft: So now he's finally doing it!@This is huge news!

group_1.textRight: Not really... The mayor was retiring anyway,@people were pushing him to go for it.

group_1.textLeft: What are you saying? Uncle is one of @the most prominent people in the region.
He's the perfect candidate for the job!
Hmm, yes... @This will surely raise our family's standing.

group_1.textRight: I...don't think he's that great of a person…
Don't worry about it. It's nothing.
In any case, my dad asked me to help@with the campaign.
I hate to drag you into it, but would@you mind giving us a hand?

group_1.textLeft: Quit acting so distant!@Of course I'll help!
It would be an honor!@This is a crucial battle for the family!
The whole Tatsuki family will help!@Together we can do this!
And so Uncle's mayoral campaign began...
We all signed on to help as his@campaign staff.

group_1.textRight: The mayor is the most important @person in Kamihama, right?

group_1.textLeft: I guess you could say that...

group_1.textRight: Wow that's amazin'!@You really are a little miss fancy pants!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, but this is where the trouble starts.
